sentences.en: ...a climate like that of our northeast coast.
sentences.cn: …同我们东北部沿海气候相似的一种气候。

sentences.en: ...the warm waters of Salt Springs Island to the northeast.
sentences.cn: …流向东北方向的盐泉岛的温泉水。

sentences.en: "We're going northeast," Paula told them, before they started.
sentences.cn: “我们将朝东北方向走，”葆拉在他们出发前告诉他们。

sentences.en: An eelpout ( Macrozoarces americanus ) of the coastal waters of northeast North America.
sentences.cn: 高鳍笛鲷一种北美东部北方海域鳕类淡水鱼 ( 美洲大绵鳚 )

sentences.en: And northeast of Baghdad in Balad, an Iraqi soldier guarding oil fields was shot dead.
sentences.cn: 巴格达最北部城市巴拉德, 一名以色列士兵看守油田是被射杀.

sentences.en: China's northeast is a charming region.
sentences.cn: 这里白山黑水,景色迷人.

sentences.en: Controlled by paleotopography and sediment source, sand bodies had a banding distribution along the northeast - southwest direction.
sentences.cn: 由于受古地形及沉积物源的控制, 砂体沿北东南西向呈条带状分布.

sentences.en: Eudora offers a unique environment and menu, located near the Lido Hotel in Northeast Beijing.
sentences.cn: 自开业以来,倍受中外宾客一致好评.

sentences.en: Key Shelterbelt Construction Program in North , Northeast and Northwest China and the Lower - Middlethe Yangtze River.
sentences.cn: “三北”和长江 中下游 地区等重点防护林建设工程.

sentences.en: Most of the woodblock prints of the Northeast are colored woodcuts.
sentences.cn: 北大荒版画基本上是套色木刻.

sentences.en: See Beijing ( Shaoxing, Shanghai, Guangdong, Sichuan, Northeast , Huangmei , Huagu ) opera.
sentences.cn: 看京 ( 越 、 沪 、 粤 、 川 、 评 、 黄、梅、花鼓 ) 戏.

sentences.en: She loved these Japanese things, while she hated the Japanese aggressors who invaded the Northeast provinces.
sentences.cn: 她爱这些东洋货, 她又恨那些东洋人;好好儿的发兵打东三省干么呢?

sentences.en: The city boasts the second biggest port in northeast China.
sentences.cn: 优越的地理位置,天然的深水良港,以港口为依托,发展城市建设.

sentences.en: The land to the north-east fell away into meadows.
sentences.cn: 陆地向东北方向倾斜延伸成了牧场。

sentences.en: The venue The Beijing Marriott Northeast was first - class the food was and the organisation was superb.
sentences.cn: 本次年会在北京海航万豪酒店举行,酒店是 一流 的,食物是美味的,组织是无以伦比的.

sentences.en: These islands of the north-east coast can only be reached in small boats.
sentences.cn: 东北部沿海的这些岛屿只有坐小船才能抵达。

words.tran_cn: 北方的，向北的；来自北方的

trans.tran_cn: 在东北的，东北部的，向东北的，（风、光线）来自东北方向的
trans.tran_en: The northeast edge, corner, or part of a place is the part which is toward the northeast
If you go northeast, you travel toward the northeast
the direction that is exactly between north and east
the direction that is exactly between north and east
